availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Presley B. Smith (Madison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County, Kentucky, native, born June 20, 1828. Son of James Smith and Nancy Smith. Married to Paulina Parrish Smith in Madison County, Kentucky, on November 13, 1851. Father of Mary M. Smith and James W. Smith in 1860. Farmer in 1850. Farmer in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, p. 254B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, p. 14

Marriage Records. Kentucky Marriages. Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky
